name: Shooting Love. 10-shuunen
summary:
Shooting Love is a collection of two shmups, where you control space ships blasting everything in sight, and dodge bullets to stay alive.

This is the second Shooing Love collection on the 360 from developer Triangle Service (the first one is titled Shooting Love 200X). This collection, Shooting Love 10-Shuunen, contains XIIZeal (XII Stag) and DeltaZeal (G-Stream G2020). It is unknown why the game names were changed here, possibly for licensing reasons.
